column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The noodles were cooked to my favorite al dente consistency
column2: and they were flavorful and chewy. The tofu was also perfectly cooked
column3: and were of the style that I prefer
column4: being not-fried as they usually are when I get tofu in soup. The veggies were all cooked well
column5: in that I didn't notice anything terrible about them in particular while consuming the dish. Honestly I didn't pay much attention
column6: as the stars of the show were definitely the broth and the noodles
column7: as should be the case with ramen.
